headline.main: Estimate of Cancer Peril In Air Travel Is Raised

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The risk of fatal cancer from radiation in airliners is 17 times greater than reported last week in a Government study, the Department of Transportation has acknowledged after other scientists found errors.
